title: Latin American history and culture an archival record. Series I, The Yale University collection of Latin American manuscripts.

description: Part of Yale University's extensive Latin America collection, these three microfilm reels deal specifically with the Caribbean from 1500 to 1935. The collection includes correspondence, legal documents, government documents, church records, and other source materials. Geographically, the collection focuses on Cuba, Jamaica, the Virgin Islands, and the Dominican Republic. The collection is predominantly in Spanish, but materials from Jamaica and the Virgin Islands are in English.
contributor: Yale University. Dept. of Manuscripts and Archives.$$QYale University. Dept. of Manuscripts and Archives.

contents: pt. 1. The Andean collection -- pt. 2. The Mexico collection -- pt. 3. The Spain collection -- pt. 4. The Brazil and Portugal collection -- pt. 5. The Carribean [sic] collection -- pt. 6. Central America collection -- pt. 7. Southern Cone collection.
lds60: Reproductions of the originals from Yale University.
